About Peace Humanitarian Initiative

PHI is a non-governmental, non-profit organization dedicated to advancing peace, stability, and human development across Africa. Founded on the belief that peace and progress are inseparable, PHI works to empower communities affected by conflict, poverty, and social fragmentation. Its vision is an Africa where peace, dignity, and opportunity are shared by all.

OUR PILLARS

Key Areas of Focus

PHI focuses on three main pillars: Peacebuilding and Conflict Resolution, Humanitarian Relief and Recovery, and Social and Economic Development. Through its people-centered approach, PHI strives to build bridges where division exists.

Peacebuilding and Conflict Resolution

Promoting dialogue, reconciliation, and community cohesion through local peace committees, leadership training, and cultural understanding initiatives.

Learn More

Humanitarian Relief and Recovery

Delivering targeted assistance to vulnerable groups, including food security, shelter, education, and psychosocial support for displaced or disadvantaged populations.

Learn More

Social and Economic Development

Supporting long-term resilience through education programs, youth empowerment, vocational training, and sustainable livelihoods projects.

Learn More

Community Empowerment

Enabling communities to take ownership of their own peace and progress through inclusive and participatory approaches.

Learn More
